title: Mercury Transit in the 10th House for Capricorn Ascendant
summary: When Mercury transits the 10th house for Capricorn Ascendant, communication, planning, and decision-making directly impact career and public image. You think strategically about goals, authority, and professional direction, with increased visibility for your ideas. Meetings, presentations, and negotiations bring results when facts are clear and delivery is composed. However, over-analysis or excessive criticism can affect reputation. Progress comes by pairing logic with responsibility, allowing Mercury’s intellect to support steady advancement and credibility in leadership roles.

sections.title: Finance
points: Income linked to decisions and planning

closing: This Mercury transit sharpens Capricorn Ascendants’ professional voice. Responsible thinking turns ideas into authority.
